mapper.sql: a.internal_account_serial_number AS "internalAccountSerialNumber", a.internal_account_name AS "internalAccountName", a.internal_account_type_id AS "internalAccountTypeId", a.internal_account_details_type_id AS "internalAccountDetailsTypeId", a.internal_account_balance_direction AS "internalAccountBalanceDirection", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.description AS "description", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO internal_account( internal_account_serial_number, internal_account_name, internal_account_type_id, internal_account_details_type_id, internal_account_balance_direction, create_time, update_time, description, remark ) VALUES ( #{internalAccountSerialNumber}, #{internalAccountName}, #{internalAccountTypeId}, #{internalAccountDetailsTypeId}, #{internalAccountBalanceDirection}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{description}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE internal_account SET internal_account_serial_number = #{internalAccountSerialNumber}, internal_account_name = #{internalAccountName}, internal_account_type_id = #{internalAccountTypeId}, internal_account_details_type_id = #{internalAccountDetailsTypeId}, internal_account_balance_direction = #{internalAccountBalanceDirection}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, description = #{description}, remark = #{remark} WHERE internal_account_serial_number = #{id}
